fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: This counts the consecutive number of presidential elections since the last unconstitutional change of government or democratic breakdown, or 1900 whichever is more recent. Do not code if there is no office of the presidency.
fxInfo_question: How many consecutive presidential elections including the current election have been held since 1900?
name: v2elprescons
